original_text: You played the whore also with the Assyrians, because you were not satisfied; yes, you played the whore with them, and still you were not satisfied.
korean_text: 네가 음욕이 차지 아니하여 또 앗수르 사람과 행음하고 그들과 행음하고도 아직도 부족하게 여겨

sentences.original_text: You played the whore also with the Assyrians
yes, you played the whore with them
and still you were not satisfied
